room_title: Escape room "Lost Ruins" by Red Door Escape Room in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Was our first time in an escape room. Ty was an excellent host. We had a blast and will definitely be returning for more date nights.

room_title: Escape room "Lost Ruins" by Red Door Escape Room in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Just had my sonâ€™s birthday party here today and they had a great time! They even escaped The Lost Ruins with 2 seconds to spare. Highly recommend this as a party place! Thanks to Kevin for making this a good experience for the boys.

room_title: Escape room "Lost Ruins" by Red Door Escape Room in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: I LOVE Red Door! I had the opportunity to play and beat both the Lost Ruins and The Gift! They were challenging but doable. I highly suggest those interested start with The Gift and later advance to more difficult ones like Lost Ruins. I will definitely be back to try the others. Shoutout to Arial for being a great game-master as well! Thank you, Red Door!

room_title: Escape room "Lost Ruins" by Red Door Escape Room in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: I'm a fan of Red Door and was excited to try this at their newest location. The room itself was great, aesthetics were wonderful but the puzzles were a bit... off. some of them just didn't make sense and we had to get a lot of help from the game masters for them. Over all I definitely recommend this room.

room_title: Escape room "Lost Ruins" by Red Door Escape Room in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: I've been to a few puzzle rooms back home in Austin but this one was definitely my favorite. My family and I had a great time trying to solve the puzzles. I really appreciate the amount of detail and well thought out of the Lost Ruins. It was incredibly immersive and I plan on returning!

room_title: Escape room "Lost Ruins" by Red Door Escape Room in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Really enjoyed coming here! Great and friendly staff, incredibly built room design, and really enjoyed the experience. Looking forward to going back when their other rooms are open. I did encounter and lost ruins.
